channel.title: XeNo-Online | Legitimately Flawless - PR (RUNE LEGIONS)
channel.description:
Since some of you find it 'offending' I'm a little more experienced with programming, then the people who bitch and moan at this project for it being better than their complete failures, I'll recite it with a tolerance level that you can even withstand. [b][size=24pt]XeNo-Online 317[/size][/b]
Thank you for viewing my project. I'll hopefully have it done by July or August. (Still in development)
Features so far:
Great combat system Skill experience speed - x4 normal Rune Scape All skills working All skills have a great and custom triangle ( I don't mean combat ) Working highscores (in beta) Working webclient (great page structure) Stable and excellent client Server made from 100% bone-scratch. (No movement, no object clicking, no skills, no experience gaining, no combat system) Great server developers, all have been programming for more than 4 years Farming using no packets, clicking scratch Realistic combat fighting Working combat triangles 474 Interface No shitty interface custom colors, or icons Random Events Automatic system-events and system-status engine Everything based on multiple timers No lag Server is un-hackable (I used Frugoo Scape's idea, which can be found on the thread he made) vBulletin 4.0.2 registered forum license (currently up) Downloadable client verision
Upcoming Updates:
All skills updated to base v2 Legions created
The Team:
Caleb - Server Programmer, Engine Programmer, Web Development ------------- Brian - Forums Development and Management WiseMen - Server Moderator, Forums Management Abcgone - Server Moderator, Forums Management Phantom - Server Super Moderator, Graphics Alex - Server Moderator, Forums Management
Thats all for now. Please read the thread instead of looking at it's style and calling it shit.

im sorry to say, x4 skill exp automatically kills your player count.

other than that the server seems pretty nice so far, keep up the work.

item.title: XeNo-Online | Legitimately Flawless - PR (RUNE LEGIONS)
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Since some of you find it ‘offending’ I’m a little more experienced with programming, then the people who bitch and moan at this project for it being better than their complete failures, I’ll recite it with a tolerance level that you can even withstand.
[size=24pt]XeNo-Online 317[/size]

Thank you for viewing my project.
I’ll hopefully have it done by July or August. (Still in development)

Features so far:

Great combat system
Skill experience speed - x4 normal Rune Scape
All skills working
All skills have a great and custom triangle ( I don’t mean combat )
Working highscores (in beta)
Working webclient (great page structure)
Stable and excellent client
Server made from 100% bone-scratch. (No movement, no object clicking, no skills, no experience gaining, no combat system)
Great server developers, all have been programming for more than 4 years
Farming using no packets, clicking scratch
Realistic combat fighting
Working combat triangles
474 Interface
No shitty interface custom colors, or icons
Random Events
Automatic system-events and system-status engine
Everything based on multiple timers
No lag
Server is un-hackable (I used Frugoo Scape’s idea, which can be found on the thread he made)
vBulletin 4.0.2 registered forum license (currently up)
Downloadable client verision

Upcoming Updates:

All skills updated to base v2
Legions created

The Team:

Caleb - Server Programmer, Engine Programmer, Web Development

Brian - Forums Development and Management
WiseMen - Server Moderator, Forums Management
Abcgone - Server Moderator, Forums Management
Phantom - Server Super Moderator, Graphics
Alex - Server Moderator, Forums Management

Thats all for now.
Please read the thread instead of looking at it’s style and calling it shit.

Read full topic
